Text: Sorry guys I can't figure out how to put it all in one torrent... it just keeps opening the folder and it only lets me put one file at a time... I've never done it before and was trying to get it one here cause there isn't one yet any advice on how to put all the files on one torrent?

@Miranda79:

You need to select "make torrent from folder", rather than "make torrent from file", in your bit torrent client.
